title: China: Meishan Boutique Hotel by Heilong Lake with Infinity Pool
description: Composed of eight Sichuan-style mansions, Hotel Indigo Heilong Lake, an IHG Hotel is a refined boutique retreat that delivers serene views of Heilong Lake. In just minutes, you can find yourself amid verdant countryside and picturesque waterfront, the perfect setting for soothing strolls. Return to your hotel to treat yourself to a refreshing dip in the infinity pool, and fine dining featuring premium wines and locally sourced Sichuan delicacies at Voisin Restaurant.
offer_address: No.5 Xihu Avenue, Si Hai Community, Heilongtan Town, Meishan 620561, China
